articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Lebanon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Lebanon
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Michel Suleiman, president of Lebanon, on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim sincerely wished the president and the people of Lebanon greater success in their efforts to preserve peace and stability and achieve the development of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop.

articles.title: KPA Warns S. Korean Forces Not to Forget Lesson of Yonphyong Island Shelling
articles.content:
KPA Warns S. Korean Forces Not to Forget Lesson of Yonphyong Island Shelling
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Command of the Korean People's Army in the southwestern sector of the front released the following statement Friday:
					 Thunderous shelling rocked the earth, pounding the enemies who mounted preemptive attacks with just showering of shells in the hotspot area in the southwestern sector of the front on November 23 three years ago.
					
					 The prompt counterattack made by the service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front turned Yonphyong Island into the sea of fire. This praiseworthy event proved that the DPRK will never tolerate anyone who provokes it and that the provokers will be made to pay a very dear price.
					
					 The Yonphyong island shelling was a result of the puppet forces' reckless provocation against the DPRK in all aspects.
					
					 The puppet forces were staging Hoguk war drill against the DPRK at that time. On November 23 they declared that they would hold adventurous artillery shelling drill, threatening the security of the territorial waters of the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean People's Army immediately sent an advance notice, denouncing the puppet forces for their sinister plot to maintain the brigandish "northern limit line" and warning them to behave with discretion.
					
					 But the puppet forces, buoyed with extreme provocative hysteria, opened fire at the sacred territorial waters of the DPRK, defying its repeated advance warnings.
					
					 There is limit to patience.
					
					 The heroic service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front launched strong counterattack all at once.
					
					 They shelled Yonphyong Island, the headquarters of the provokers, engulfing the island in the sea of fire.
					
					 This left puppet soldiers dead and wounded, and others went into hiding into shelters and dugout to find a way out.
					
					 Puppet army barracks, commanding posts, police stations and other army and police buildings turned into ashes and K-9 howitzers, radars and firepower strike means with various missions turned into scrap iron.
					
					 Much embarrassed by the powerful retaliatory blows of the KPA, the puppet military sent a notice to the KPA, begging it to stop shelling.
					
					 This was tantamount to a surrender document unprecedented in the history of the north-south relations.
					
					 No sooner had he received a report about the Yonphyong Island shelling than traitor Lee Myung Bak rushed into the underground cellar of Chongwadae where he cried out to stop it from "developing into a war". Later puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin made an official appearance at which he said that the shelling was an "indelible and painful wound" and a "case that gave great disappointment".
					
					 The Yonphyong island shelling was a just strike of the army and people of the DPRK who do not tolerate even a bit those who infringe upon the inviolable sovereignty and the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 It is quite natural that the service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front mercilessly countered the provokers who dared opened fire into the territorial waters of the DPRK.
					
					 The shelling was a retaliatory war waged by the defenders of sovereignty. It taught the puppet military warmongers how much price they would have to pay for their reckless provocation.
					
					 This was also an eruption of the pent-up grudge of the army and people of the DPRK in the face of the reckless provocation of the maniacs keen on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The deep-running hatred toward the enemies resulted in the shower of shells and the mounting resentment turned the island into the heap of ashes.
					
					 The KPA side did not suffer a single casualty or the loss of single piece of weapons from the shelling. It was a proud and victorious battle that demonstrated the might of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army.
					
					 Throughout the shelling the service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front and the people fought in the same trench and after the battle they climbed to nearby hills and even on rooftops of dwelling houses, shouting hurrah and sharing strength and courage.
					
					 The scene on the Island, on the other hand, was quite spectacular.
					
					 Not only inhabitants but service personnel of the puppet army tried to escape from the island to get rid of horror. The sea route leading to Inchon was blocked as they fled in disarray.
					
					 But far from drawing a due lesson from the shelling the puppet forces tried to convince the public that the shelling incident was a result of "provocation" by the DPRK. They even described their defeat as "victory" and held the farce of anti-communist "commemorative event".
					
					  There are countries and nations which commemorate and celebrate war victories but it is only the south Korean puppet forces who describe defeat as "victory". How pitiful they are.
					
					 Last year traitor Lee Myung Bak with just "2MB" of IQ held the farce. This year Park Geun Hye and her group is behaving just as same as Lee.
					
					 Park and her group should draw a bitter lesson from the shameful defeat they sustained from the Yonphyong island shelling.
					
					 It is the fixed will and determination of the army and people of the DPRK including the service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front not to miss an opportunity should the puppet forces make provocation again.
					
					 Three years ago the retaliatory blow was confined to the Yonphyong island only but this time Chongwadae and other bases of the puppet forces will be put within the striking range.
					
					 The puppet forces are blustering that they reinforced MLRS, Cobra choppers and Spike missiles and other strike means in their bid to retrieve their defeat. They are even spreading the news that they finished the first-phase "fortification" project on the five islands in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 This is as foolish an act as trying to evade the shower of shelling with an ordinary umbrella.
					
					 They should clearly bear in mind that everything will turn into stick of taffy by the unprecedentedly powerful military strike of the KPA.
					
					 They should never forget that the recurrence of the reckless provocation will reduce Chongwadae into the sea of fire leading it to the reunification.
					
					 If they run reckless, oblivious of the bitter lesson of the defeat, they will never be able to escape miserable fate.
					
					 Victory is always in store for the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army, defenders of justice.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Raps Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Raps Hostile Forces' Anti-DPRK Campaign
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Friday in connection with the fact that the forces hostile to the DPRK are resorting to the unreasonable act of linking it with the international drug-related crimes:
					 In recent days the Western reptile media are spreading sheer sophism that the DPRK is a major hotbed of international drug-related crimes. Its origin is none other than the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime.
					
					 The DPRK totally rejects it as it is another politically motivated puerile charade invented by those hostile forces keen on the base smear campaign aimed to isolate and stifle it.
					
					 Drug manufacture and smuggling are strictly banned in the DPRK, and such practices are never tolerated under its social system.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is on the top of the list of drug consumption in the world and has the worst record of drug-related crimes. It is a hard fact that drug manufacture and smuggling are rampant in those countries where the U.S. stretches out its tentacles of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers, ringleaders of the international drug-related crimes, would be well advised to mind their own business.

articles.title: S. Korea's Abduction of DPRK Inhabitants Rapped and Countries Concerned Urged to Repatriate Them
articles.content:
S. Korea's Abduction of DPRK Inhabitants Rapped and Countries Concerned Urged to Repatriate Them
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA in connection with the fact that agents and human traffic dealers of the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) were arrested by Chinese security personnel while abducting inhabitants of the DPRK to forcibly take them to south Korea:
					 As already reported, agents and human traffic traders of the IS were arrested by security personnel of China while abducting several inhabitants of the DPRK to forcibly take them to south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean regime is now impudently making much fuss, putting a "diplomatic pressure" on a country concerned and urging it to "provide the status of refugees"  to them. This is just like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 Even the U.S. State Department made such ridiculous remarks as claiming that those inhabitants should not be sent back to the north.
					
					 This is sheer sophism of a brazen-faced gangster.
					
					 This case is an unpardonable and unethical criminal act as it is another organized and deliberate abduction of inhabitants of the DPRK.
					
					 It is well known to the world that such official institutions as the IS, a center for hatching plots against the DPRK, lured and abducted inhabitants of the DPRK to take them to south Korea for using them for anti-DPRK smear campaigns by infiltrating plot-breeding organizations under the guise of "religion", "human rights", etc. and brokers blinded with money-making into a third country.
					
					 Dozens of inhabitants of the DPRK succeeded in returning home, cursing the hell-like south Korea to where  they had been forcibly taken after being abducted by puppet forces. Truth about their abduction operations and the south Korean regime's detention of those inhabitants from the north wishing to go back there have been brought to daylight.
					
					 It had already been disclosed that south Korean agents' attempt to take away nine youngsters to south Korea via a Southeastern Asian country after abducting them in a northern border area of the DPRK broke down.
					
					 This indicates that the south Korean regime is indiscriminately luring and abducting inhabitants of the DPRK whether they are adults or children.
					
					 Ceaseless complaints are made by citizens of the DPRK overseas and their children that some of them were lured and abducted by south Korean agents and that they received threatening phone calls from unidentified persons who hold them in hostage. 
					
					 The recent case is part of the above-said operations, clear evidence proving the hideous luring and abducting operations of the puppet regime.
					
					 After their agents were caught red-handed, the puppet regime is busy describing those inhabitants as "defectors from the north" or "refugees" in a bid to cover up their unethical acts. But this only brings into bolder relief its despicable true colors as man-hunters.
					
					 The world knows no such villains who, blinded with confrontation with fellow countrymen, are conducting luring and abducting operations in broad daylight in wanton infringement upon the sovereignty of the other country and international law as the south Korean regime.
					
					 The above-said crimes of the south Korean regime deserve bitter condemnation and such gangsterism should not be allowed under any circumstances.
					
					 The DPRK calls upon the countries concerned to firmly reject and censure  the hostile acts of the U.S. and the south Korean regime against the DPRK and urges them to send back its inhabitants as early as possible  as required by international law.
					
					 Under the present grave situation where the IS and those in league with it carry on their operations to lure and abduct inhabitants of the DPRK and their children and make threatening phone  calls taking them as hostages the DPRK will severely punish all those involved in such operations by employing every means and method as already declared.

articles.title: GFTUK Supports S. Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
GFTUK Supports S. Korean People's Struggle
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The actions of workers and people of other strata against the south Korean group of traitors' wholesale fascist crackdown upon the progressive democratic forces and its moves to revive "the yusin" dictatorship are now mounting like an active volcano.
					 Extremely taken aback by these actions, the puppet group is hurling more than 10 000 police force into brutally cracking down upon participants in peaceful demonstrations with water cannons. But organizations of workers and people of other strata are intensifying their protest actions against this suppression.
					
					  A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea in a statement issued on Friday said that the resistance of the people is an eruption of the pent-up grudge and resentment at the remnants of "yusin" and the Park Geun Hye regime working with blood shot eyes to bring back the most evil era of "yusin" dictatorship to south Korea in total disregard of elementary democratic demands.
					
					 No repressive regimes in south Korea kicked up such indiscriminate repressive campaign against the labor movement and progressive democratic forces to get rid of the worst ruling crisis, bringing to light their true colors as fascist ones as the present conservative regime, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have gone desperate in their moves to violate democracy and revive "yusin" dictatorship despite the strong denunciation of the public at home and abroad. This is aimed to nip in the bud progress and democracy in south Korea and thus prop up the pro-U.S. unpopular ruling system and lay a foundation for their long-term office.
					
					 It is shame and disaster for the nation that "yusin" dictatorship is being revived in south Korea though it was sternly punished by the popular masses decades ago.
					
					  The working class in the north will positively support the workers and other people in the south in their sacred struggle for a democratic new society and genuine new life, it stressed.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK headed by its Deputy Kim Song Hui left here Friday to participate in the meeting of women lawmakers in Northeast Asian countries to be  held in Mongolia.

articles.title: RC Delegation of DPRK Returns Home
articles.content:
RC Delegation of DPRK Returns Home
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Executive Vice-Chairman Paek Yong Ho returned home by air on Friday after taking part in the 19th General Assembly and the meeting of the Board of Directors of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies held in Sidney, Australia.

articles.title: Reception Given on Anniversary of DPRK-PRC Agreement on Economic Cooperation
articles.content:
Reception Given on Anniversary of DPRK-PRC Agreement on Economic Cooperation
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Trade and the Ministry of Culture of the DPRK co-hosted a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Friday to mark the 60th anniversary of the agreement on the economic and cultural cooperation between the governments of the DPRK and the People's Republic of China.
					 Present there on invitation were Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, staff members of his embassy and Chinese guests staying here.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and officials concerned.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Sci-tech Achievements in Sports Closes
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Sci-tech Achievements in Sports Closes
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of sci-tech achievements in sports was closed.
					 In the exhibition held from November 19 to 22 Kim Il Sung University came first in the field of sports paraphernalia and measuring apparatuses, the Sports Science Institute in the field of sports computer program and the Sports Nutrition Institute, the Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons and Korea University of Physical Education in the field of sports medicines and nutrients.
					
					 The exhibition offered an occasion in showcasing the nation's daily developing sports science and bringing the sports technique in various events to a high level.

articles.title: New High-Tech Equipment Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New High-Tech Equipment Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Meari Company of the DPRK has recently produced 100W trumpet speaker, infra-red prospecting apparatus and smoke sensor controller.
					 In this regard, Kim Il Ryong, director of the company, told KCNA:
					
					 Those high-tech products have been appreciated by customers.
					
					100W speaker has been introduced in outdoor and indoor large expanses such as park and gymnasium.
					
					 It is easy to be moved and installed as it is made of high-strength plastic material.
					
					 The infra-red prospecting apparatus is an intellectual remote-controlled one for surveying mineral resources and solving geological problems.
					
					 It has been also proved to be efficient in prospecting underground resources including nonferrous minerals, geotherm, underground water and coal.
					
					 Included in its field of usage are geological survey, geological engineering and environmental geological study.
					
					 Its surveying capacity is 100m at its maximum and its speed very fast.
					
					 It has several functions such as saving and getting access to gathered information. It also has a port for PC connection.
					
					 The smoke sensor controller is one of high-tech products to be introduced in industrial and public buildings, schools and dwelling houses.

articles.title: Children of Fallen Fighters of KPA Navy to Study at Revolutionary Schools
articles.content:
Children of Fallen Fighters of KPA Navy to Study at Revolutionary Schools
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un saw to it that children of fallen fighters of KPA Navy, who met heroic deaths while performing their combat duties in October, study at revolutionary schools in Pyongyang.
					 Before leaving for Pyongyang, they visited the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to pay tribute to them.
					
					 Song Mi Ok, wife of fallen KPA officer Jang Se Chol, told KCNA that boundless is the loving care shown by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for the bereaved families.
					
					 Kim Tae Myong, son of fallen non-commissioned officer Kim Tong Hyok, and Kang Hyo Jong and Kang Hyon Jong, daughters of fallen officer Kang Chol Jun, said they would prepare themselves to be servicepersons, who would remain loyal to the Songun (military-first) leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea as their fathers did.
					
					 Kim Mi Ran, wife of fallen officer So Kwang Jin, said: 
					
					"I will live up to the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, keeping in mind the loving care shown by him for my daughters".

articles.title: Legends about Mt. Kumgang (9)
articles.content:
Legends about Mt. Kumgang (9)
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- There is a fantastic rock on the mid-slope of Sejon Peak in Mt. Kumgang, which has been called "Rabbit Rock". The upper part of the rock reminds everyone of the head of a rabbit and its lower part the body of a tortoise.
					 The rock tells about a legend well known among the local people. 
					
					 The superb scenery of Mt. Kumgang drove all those in the heaven to unanimously saying they would have nothing to envy if they spent even a moment in the mountain during their lifetime. A rabbit, which was living in the moon while pounding herbs in a mortar, was one of them.
					
					 One day, it left the heaven for the mountain under the approval of the king. The king instructed it to return before the fifteenth night of the month.
					
					 When the rabbit reached Sejon Peak in Mt. Kumgang, it was fascinated by the breathtaking landscape of the mountain.
					
					 Infatuated by the scenery, it could neither remember the instruction of the king nor take a step and thus violated the king's instruction.
					
					 Angered by the rabbit's behavior, the king sentenced it to being a tortoise.
					
					 From the very moment, the rabbit was gradually turned into a tortoise and finally into the rock of the present time.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Class Education
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Class Education
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article underscores the need to intensify class education among service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					 It goes on:
					
					 To intensify class education is essential for resolutely smashing the undisguised anti-DPRK moves staged by the hostile forces.
					
					 The past history clearly proves that if class education is neglected, one will not be vigilant against the moves of class enemies and this will result in such a catastrophic consequence of losing the socialist system and gains of revolution at the cost of blood.
					
					 Steadily intensifying class education is an important demand for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Matchless devotion, self-sacrificing spirit and indomitable will all stem from strong class consciousness.
					
					 The people of the DPRK could create the miracle of racing against the times and create everything from scratch as they had a firm determination to show once again the stamina of the heroic Korean people to the enemies who blustered that Korea will not be able to stand after the lapse of a century, and as they were clear aware that the post-war rehabilitation was an acute stand-off and a serious class struggle with the U.S. imperialists and class enemies. 
					
					 The drive for building a thriving nation accompanies severe class struggle.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will resolutely foil sanctions and pressure offensive of the imperialists with high class awareness and surging hatred toward the enemies and build a thriving socialist nation on this land where all dreams of the people come true.

articles.title: Solidarity of Progressive Forces in S. Korea Serves as Powerful Weapon: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Solidarity of Progressive Forces in S. Korea Serves as Powerful Weapon: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article that the solidarity and unity of progressive forces are essential for ending the blood-stained fascist dictatorship in south Korea and democratizing society.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The progressive forces' solidarity and unity have faced especially important task under the prevailing grim situation in south Korea where the "yusin" dictatorship is being revived.
					
					 The puppet group's frantic racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" is not just aimed at removing a few progressive political parties and organizations.
					
					 Lurking behind it is a sordid scheme to tarnish the image of progressive forces and build mistrust among them and thus undermine their unity.
					
					 By doing so, the puppet group seeks to deflect the public attention from the case of illegal interference in the "presidential election" by the Intelligence Service and stamp out the anti-"government" struggle of the people aspiring after progress and democracy in the end.
					
					 If the pursuance of one's own party interests and the revival of "yusin" dictatorship are tolerated, far from countering the puppet group's smear campaign concerning the "forces following the north" with vigilance, south Korean society will turn into a theater of rowdyism where fascism stalks and the unity of the progressive forces break down.
					
					 The struggle for democratization of south Korean society is a fierce one between the progressive and conservative camps.
					
					 The working people can not enjoy the elementary dignity and rights of human being under the fascist dictatorial system and they will only suffer if they overlook it.
					
					 Whether they win or defeat depends on whether they wage an unflinching struggle through solidarity and unity among the progressive, patriotic and democratic forces, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Peace and Security in Asia-Pacific Region
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Peace and Security in Asia-Pacific Region
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- It is the most urgent and solemn task for the progressive people in the world to ensure peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region against the imperialists' aggression and war moves.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 The people all over the world wish to live in a peaceful and prospering world free from aggression and war.
					
					 People so much desire peace and security but they don't come of themselves.
					
					 They can not be achieved without struggle under the situation where the imperialists are getting more vicious to hold world supremacy.
					
					 The U.S. has recently argued that it is an Asia-Pacific country in a bid to exert influence on the region.
					
					 The U.S. intensified military alliance with its satellite forces has rendered the regional situation tenser, seriously threatening the regional peace and security.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has become the biggest hotspot in the region where constant danger of war lingers.
					
					 The grave situation on the peninsula is a serious threat not only to the Korean people and those of the neighboring countries but those of the Asia-Pacific region and, furthermore, all the countries of the world.
					
					 The world peace-loving people are fully capable of foiling the imperialists' war moves and safeguarding peace and security when they pool their efforts.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to reject the imperialists' aggression and war moves on the international arena to protect global peace.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts S. Korea's "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts S. Korea's "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- "Theory of adhering to principle" which the south Korean authorities advocate as "policy toward the north" is being denounced by the public at home and abroad less than one year after its appearance.
					 They described the positive signs that were seen in the north-south relations as a "result of their adherence to the principle" while the stalemate as an "unavoidable pain" in the course of "adhering to the principle". They also excused their anti-DPRK provocative moves as an act for showing "principle". But no one will be taken in by such a poor excuse.
					
					 The public is unanimous in assessing it as sophism for maintaining confrontation.
					
					 One can clearly understand it from the contents of the "principle" which the puppet forces call for adhering to.
					
					 The core of the principle envisages turning the "abnormal relations" in the period of the June 15 era into "normal state-to-state relations consistent with international norms" and leading the "north into change" through international cooperation for pressure and thus realizing "reunification under the liberal democratic system".
					
					 It was, in a word, meant to establish "new framework of south-north relations" in which the south is neither being led by the north nor making a concession. This was raised by traitor Lee Myung Bak only to be thrown into the dustbin.
					
					 The principle further traces back to the "policy toward the north" pursued by "yusin" dictator who earned an ill fame in the north-south relations.
					
					 Traitor Park Chung-hee was a die-hard confrontational maniac who was buoyed with the ambition for "unification by prevailing over communism" while trumpeting about "confrontation accompanying dialogue" and "contest of social systems".
					
					 That's why he put up the theory of "two Koreas" proposed by the U.S. and worked hard to keep the nation divided for an indefinite period soon after he signed the July 4 north-south joint statement.
					
					 He insisted on state-to-state relations on the Korean Peninsula and pushed forward his plan to fix the division of the nation while denying the homogeneity of the nation whose history spans 5 000 years.
					
					 Not satisfied with the territorial and national division at the hands of outsiders, he committed the traitorous crime of building a concrete wall, physically bisecting the peninsula into two parts.
					
					 The same is the case with the "north policy" pursued by Park Geun Hye.
					
					 She openly claims that she entered the political arena to "restore the honor of her father as a politician". After taking office she has left no means untried to call back the departed soul of "yusin". This speaks volumes for her true colors.
					
					 The chief executive openly spoke ill of the social system and policy of the fellow countrymen in the north and solicited for cooperation for escalating confrontation with them. In the future "north policy" orientation document that was crafted shortly ago she even denied part of the October 4 declaration and added such provocative provisions as the "north's nuclear issue" and institution of "north human rights act".
					
					 Given the development of the situation for the less than a year, no one can vouch that she would not commit traitorous acts more hideous than what her father committed and can go impudent calling for "adhering to principle" in a bid to attain her sinister intention.
					
					 Park's "theory of adhering to principle" is, in the final analysis, a theory of escalating confrontation in the period of "yusin", a replica of the theory of fixing division and the extension of the theory of inciting a war.
					
					 The principle to be held fast to by the north and the south is the three principles of national reunification-independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity-and the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the historic north-south joint declarations.  There can never be any other principle.
					
					 The puppet regime will meet a miserable end earlier should it keep escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen while opposing the truth of the times and history.

articles.title: South of Pomminryon Vows to Implement Inter-Korean Joint Declarations
articles.content:
South of Pomminryon Vows to Implement Inter-Korean Joint Declarations
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on Nov. 20 to mark the 23rd anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon.
					 Pomminryon has always stood in the van of the struggle to force outside forces out of south Korea and achieve the independent reunification by the concerted efforts of Koreans under the banner of national independence and the great national unity, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have a gloomy prospect owing to Lee Myung Bak and Park Guen Hye's denial of the north-south joint declaration and their anti-reunification and treacherous acts.
					
					 The Park regime is busy staging war drills against compatriots while depending on the war alliance with the U.S. and Japan, pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase. Its moves are aimed at exterminating the nation and keeping it divided for an indefinite period.
					
					 The Park regime is mercilessly suppressing Pomminryon and other organizations and pro-reunification patriotic figures for their actions for national reconciliation, unity and reunification in support of the north-south joint declaration after labeling them as "forces following the north and benefiting enemies". It is intensifying the fascist crackdown to dissolve and stamp out the pro-reunification patriotic forces and progressive democratic forces.
					
					 Although the South Headquarters of Pomminryon is undergoing difficulties and trials, it will overcome them with optimism and courage and carry on the struggle to thoroughly preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to the last.
					
					 The South Headquarters of Pomminryon will surely protect the banner of the movement for solidarity among compatriots in the south, the north and abroad and great national unity which it has firmly preserved during the last 23 years.
					
					 It will wage a more dynamic nation-wide struggle for solidarity and alliance to achieve the national reconciliation and unity under the banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks Slammed
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Voice of People on Nov. 19 carried an editorial titled the "President's policy speech neglects all people and 'National Assembly'".
					 The editorial said that on Nov. 18 Park Guen Hye made a "policy speech," the first of its kind since she took office, but the speech is peppered with admonitions made against the opposition camp and the people as regards the social crisis.
					
					 The present crisis was triggered off by the obstructions of the investigation into the power organs' interference in the election, moves to cover up the truth about it and dissolve the progressive political party and continued non-fulfillment of commitments to economic democracy and people's wellbeing, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Therefore, the chief executive's speech should help alleviate the people's worries about all these things.
					
					 This being a hard reality, she let loose a spate of such irresponsible remarks that the "National Assembly is the center of politics" and "she would respect and accept anything if ruling and opposition parties have sufficient discussions and reach an agreement". Was it not the chief executive who interfered in every matter to bar the NA from exercising any political influence, it queried.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that even before making the "policy speech" she let police encircle the building of the NA and as soon as the speech was over, policemen committed violence against a lawmaker from an opposition party. This dramatically showed Chongwadae's violation of law and symbolically indicated the chief executive's message to opposition parties.
					
					 There is a limit to the people's patience, the editorial noted, warning that the regime making a mockery of public mind-set and trampling down opposition parties can never last for a long time.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Slam Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Slam Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Tokyo, November 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for its frantic moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship.
					 Kim Sun Dok, chairperson of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, denounced the Park Geun Hye group for its moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship while suppressing the progressive political parties and organizations in a bid to get rid of the predicament into which it has been thrown owing to the Intelligence Service's interference in the election.
					
					 The chairperson called for not allowing the return of the era of nightmare, declaring the Korean women in Japan would actively join the south Korean people in their just actions for independence, democracy and reunification against fascist dictatorship.
					
					 Song Ki Hwang, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the Korean Youth League in Japan, accused the Park group of calling back the departed soul in the dark era of "yusin" dictatorship and driving the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe while talking about the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" and "confrontation of the social systems".
					
					 He warned that those keen to revive the remnants of the era of "yusin" and establish the "second yusin dictatorship" should look back upon what miserable end Park Chung-hee met.
					
					 Ro Mu Hyon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, recalled that south Korean people from all walks of life are staging actions against the moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship, adding that with no desperate moves can the conservative group deter the people from achieving justice and truth, reconciliation and unity between the north and the south.
					
					 Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, urged the Park group to keenly realize that it is grave and shameful acts against the nation and reunification to  revive the era of "yusin" dictatorship and  stop at once its brutal crackdown upon the progressive forces.

articles.title: Korean Organization in Japan Denounces South Korean Authorities for Suppressing UPP
articles.content:
Korean Organization in Japan Denounces South Korean Authorities for Suppressing UPP
 Tokyo, November 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Korean Human Rights Association in Japan some days ago released a statement in protest against the south Korean conservative group's moves to forcibly dissolve a legitimate progressive political party.
					 The statement accused the present ruling quarters in south Korea of filing a suit in the constitutional court for a judgment aimed at dissolving the Unified Progressive Party (UPP).
					
					 This fascist action is a grave challenge to democracy, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The UPP is a legitimate political party supported by the south Koreans desirous of independence, democracy and national reunification.
					
					 However, the present ruling forces are making desperate efforts to dissolve the progressive party at any cost. This is absolutely intolerable as it is tantamount to totally disregarding the will of the people who voted for the party in the election.
					
					 It is an elementary requirement of international law that the people's political and democratic rights should be guaranteed and it is the common sense of the international community that their will should be respected.
					
					 The ruling forces' above-said moves should be checked at once.

articles.title: Commemorative Event Held in Cambodia
articles.content:
Commemorative Event Held in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- An event for celebrating the 19th anniversary of the naming of the Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Street took place in Phnom Penh, Cambodia on November 14.
					 Present there were figures of different units including Phnom Penh City Council and municipal administration office of Phnom Penh.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to the country and his embassy members.
					
					 Participants laid floral baskets before the sign of the Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Street.
					
					 A member of the City Council said:
					
					 The friendly relations between the two countries are developing on good terms true to the noble desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and they will be forever in the future, too.
					
					 We will preserve and manage the street, the symbol of the friendship of the two peoples.
					
					 We wish supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un greater success in his noble work for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: National Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Pakistan
articles.content:
National Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A national committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Karachi, Pakistan on November 13.
					 Senator Amar Jit Malhotra was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The national committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's noble life and his immortal exploits between December 1, 2013 and February 20, 2014.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed in Bangladesh on November 14.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events in order to introduce and disseminate immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Sofia, Bulgaria on November 12.
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising leader Kim Jong Il's noble life and his immortal exploits on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente libanes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente libanes
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Libano,  Michel Suleiman, en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais.
					En la misiva, el remitente hizo votos por mayores exitos en los esfuerzos del destinatario y el pueblo libanes por defender la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Titeres surcoreanos no deben olvidar derrota en Yonphyong, declara comandancia del frente sudoeste
articles.content:
Titeres surcoreanos no deben olvidar derrota en Yonphyong, declara comandancia del frente sudoeste
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica hoy la siguiente declaracion:
					El 23 de noviembre de hace 3 anos, estremecio la zona candente del frente sudoeste el fuego artillero de justicia contra los provocadores que abrieron primero el fuego.
					
					El contragolpe inmediato de los oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste del EPC, que envolvio en llamas la isla Yonphyong, fue un suceso bravo que demostro a todo el mundo que la RPDC no perdona a los que la atacan y cuan caro les cuesta la provocacion.
					
					El temerario acto provocador de los titeres surcoreanos fue detonante del incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					En pleno ejercicio militar anti-RPDC "Hoguk", ellos anunciaron oficialmente que librarian el 23 de noviembre un aventurero entrenamiento de artilleria en la isla Yonphyong que significaba una amenaza a las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC.
					
					El EPC envio de inmediato un aviso que les exigio actuar con prudencia condenando su siniestra intencion de mantener la gangsteril "linea de limite al Norte".
					
					 Pero, los titeres surcoreanos, enloquecidos por provocar, desoyeron el reiterado aviso previo de la RPDC y se atrevieron a disparar hacia el mar jurisdiccional de esta.
					
					Nuestra paciencia tambien tiene su limite.
					
					Comenzo a la vez el fuerte contraataque de nuestros valientes oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste.
					
					Los proyectiles cayeron como lluvias en la isla Yonphyong, antro de los provocadores.
					
					En un abrir y cerrar de ojos, la isla se convirtio en un mar de fuego.
					
					Se produjeron bajas y lesionados entre los efectivos del ejercito titere surcoreano y los sobrevivientes huyeron en busca de refugios.
					
					Los cuarteles y puestos de mando del ejercito titere, la estacion policiaca y los demas establecimientos militares y policiales se redujeron a cenizas mientras diversos medios de artilleria, inclusive los canones de tiro parabolico K-9 y los radares, se hacian chatarras.
					
					Espantado por el golpe de represalia, el circulo militar surcoreano remitio al EPC un aviso suplicando el paro de fuego.
					
					Esto significo el acta de capitulacion sin precedente en la historia de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Se conocio despues que tan pronto como recibiera el informe del incidente, el traidor Lee Myung Bak se refugio apresuradamente en el sotano de Chongwadae (Casa Azul) instruyendo frenar la "ampliacion de batalla".
					
					En tanto, Kim Kwan Jin, ministro titere de Defensa Nacional, reconocio en un lugar publico que el incidente fue una "herida muy dolorosa que no se puede olvidar" y "antecedente que dio una decepcion demasiado grande".
					
					En esa batalla de justicia, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC demostraron que no perdonan ni un apice a los que se atreven a atentar contra nuestra soberania y dignidad.
					
					Fue justo que los oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste hayan asestado un golpe demoledor a los provocadores que lanzaron primero los proyectiles hacia las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC.
					
					El incidente fue una batalla de venganza de los defensores de la soberania que ensenaron claramente a los belicistas de la capa militar titere cuan les cuesta la absurda provocacion.
					
					Devino tambien la explosion de ira acumulada del ejercito y pueblo coreanos por la imprudente provocacion de los maniacos de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					En aquel entonces, tal furia se reflejo en las rafagas de venganza que redujeron a cenizas la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Para la RPDC, el intercambio de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong fue un triunfo orgulloso que hizo alarde a todo el mundo del poderio del ejercito heroico y revolucionario del monte Paektu que no sufrio entonces ni una sola baja ni la perdida de ninguna arma.
					
					Durante la batalla, los oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste combatieron junto con los habitantes locales y despues del paro de fuego, compartieron la victoria aplastante coreando vivas en las cimas de montes y hasta sobre los tejados del poblado.
					
					En contraste, se ha dado una escena de ruina en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Los islenos y hasta los oficiales y soldados del ejercito titere surcoreano intentaban la fuga para liberarse del panico y pesadilla, de tal modo que fuera bloqueada hasta la ancha ruta maritima hacia Inchon.
					
					En vez de aprender la leccion, desde el ano pasado, los titeres enganan la opinion publica como si el incidente fuera estallado por el "acto provocador" de la RPDC y realizan hasta el "acto conmemorativo" anti-RPDC describiendo su derrota como "victoria".
					
					Todos los paises y naciones de este mundo celebran y festejan las victorias, pero, los titeres surcoreanos son los unicos que "conmemoran" su derrota pintandola como "triunfo".
					
					!Que miserables son ellos!
					
					Park Geun-hye y sus compinches son identicos al traidor Lee Myung Bak con un indice de intelectualidad de 2MB.
					
					Park y su horda deben aprender la leccion de su derrota vergonzosa sufrida en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos, en particular los oficiales y soldados del frente suroeste mantienen la invariable voluntad y determinacion de no perder nunca la oportunidad si los titeres vuelven a cometer tal provocacion.
					
					Hace 3 anos, el fuego de venganza se limito a la isla Yonphyong, pero esta vez sus blancos seran todos los bastiones de los titeres surcoreanos, inclusive Chongwadae.
					
					Para tomar desquite de su derrota, ellos anuncian ahora que reforzaron los medios de ataque de la isla Yonphyong con el despliegue adicional de los lanzacohetes reactivos, el radar sofisticado anti-artilleria, el helicoptero de ataque Cobra y los misiles Spike. Ademas, para dar la impresion de que se puede protegerse del ataque de la RPDC, dicen que fue concluida la obra de "fortificacion" de primera etapa en las 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					Pero, este anuncio es una tonteria de quien trata de defenderse de la avalancha de obuses con un simple paraguas.
					
					Ellos deben darse clara cuenta de que todos esos medios seran liquidados en un instante ante el ataque militar sin precedente del EPC.
					
					No deben olvidar ni un momento que si se repite la provocacion imprudente, el conflicto armado de la isla Yonphyong se extendera a la batalla para arruinar Chongwadae y a la guerra de reunificacion. 
					
					Si los titeres se abalanzan imprudentemente contra la RPDC olvidando la leccion amarga de la isla Yonphyong, no evitaran un fin tragico.
					
					La victoria sera siempre del potente ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, defensor de la justicia.

articles.title: CRPP urge a paises interesados devolver a los habitantes raptados de la RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP urge a paises interesados devolver a los habitantes raptados de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que recientemente, el organo de seguridad publica de China descubrio y arresto a los titeres surcoreanos, que intentaban llevar al Sur de Corea a los ciudadanos raptados y secuestrados de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio la vispera a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Como ya trascendidos, se conocio hace poco el hecho de que el organo de seguridad publica de China arresto a los miembros de entidades intrigantes y los traficantes de seres humanos que a ordenes del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea (SNI), raptaron a varios habitantes de la RPDC y trataron de trasladarlos al territorio surcoreano.
					
					Al respecto, la banda de titeres surcoreanos arma escandalo diciendo que se debe ejercer la "presion diplomatica" al pais correspondiente y este tiene que conceder la "posicion de refugiado" a los norcoreanos secuestrados.
					
					Hasta el Departamento de Estado norteamericano dice ridiculamente que "no se debe devolverlos al Norte de Corea".
					
					Es una sofisteria tan cinica.
					
					El presente caso resulta otro imperdonable crimen antietico porque hizo conocer claramente el caracter organizado y planificado del rapto a nuestros habitantes.
					
					Todo el mundo sabe que el SNI, antro de complots, y otros organos oficiales del Sur de Corea secuestran en los terceros paises a los habitantes de la RPDC movilizando las entidades intrigantes, disfrazadas de religiosas y  "DDHH" y a los intermediarios de la trata de seres humanos y usan a los secuestrados en la demagogia anti-RPDC una vez trasladados al Sur de Corea.
					
					Son varios los habitantes norcoreanos que fueron secuestrados por los titeres surcoreanos y volvieron a la RPDC abandonando la infernal tierra surcoreana.
					
					Ellos revelaron el hecho de que la banda surcoreana retiene a los norcoreanos que desean volver a la tierra natal.
					
					En particular, el descubierto caso de que la banda titere surcoreana intento llevar al Sur de Corea por via del Sudeste Asiatico a 9 adolescentes norcoreanos secuestrados en la zona fronteriza septentrional, deja conocer que el secuestro y el rapto se perpetran indiscriminadamente sin distincion de edades.
					
					Ultimamente, se reportan los casos de rapto de algunos ciudadanos, que trabajan actualmente en el extranjero, y sus hijos y de llamadas telefonicas de los sujetos desconocidos que chantajean tomando a aquellos como rehenes.
					
					El presente caso es otra prueba que revela tales atrocidades de la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					Para encubrir su acto antietico, los tipejos surcoreanos arrestados in fraganti dicen que "ellos (secuestrados) son fugitivos y refugiados norcoreanos", pero este subterfugio no da otro resultado que demostrar su fachada de cazador de personas.
					
					En el mundo no hay otros elementos tan malditos y corruptos como los titeres surcoreanos que enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento fratricida, secuestran a plena luz del dia a los connacionales violando la soberania de otro pais y hasta la ley internacional.
					
					El crimen de ellos debe ser condenado severamente sin tolerar jamas.
					
					La RPDC demanda con urgencia a los paises interesados rechazar categoricamente los actos hostiles anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos y devolver cuanto antes a los ciudadanos norcoreanos segun el derecho internacional.
					
					Puesto que el SNI y sus complices secuestran a los ciudadanos de la RPDC y sus hijos y hacen llamadas telefonicas de chantaje tomandolos como rehenes, como hemos declarado ya, castigaremos sin piedad usando todos los medios y metodos a todos los participantes en el secuestro y el rapto de nuestros habitantes.

articles.title: RPDC decide fundar zonas de desarrollo economico en provincias
articles.content:
RPDC decide fundar zonas de desarrollo economico en provincias
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publico el dia 21 el decreto sobre la fundacion de las zonas de desarrollo economico en las provincias.
					Segun el documento, una parte de la comuna Ojok del distrito Uiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte se fusionara con la comuna Ryongun que se incorporara a la ciudad de Sinuiju, siendo la zona de desarrollo economico Amnokgang de la misma provincia.
					
					En algunas porciones de la comuna Mitha (inclusive el islote Poldung) y la Phosang de la ciudad de Manpho de la provincia de Jagang y en unas partes de la comuna Tok-am y la Kosong del distrito Wiwon de la misma provincia, se crearan la zona de desarrollo economico de Manpho y la otra de desarrollo industrial de Wiwon de la provincia de Jagang, respectivamente.
					
					En algunas partes de la comuna Phyonghwa del distrito Sinphyong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte y de la comuna Sosong de la ciudad de Songrim de la misma provincia, se estableceran la zona de desarrollo turistico de Sinphyong y la zona de elaboracion para la exportacion de Songrim de la provincia de Hwanghaang del Norte, respectivamente.
					
					Algunas partes de la comuna Hyondong de la ciudad de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon se convertiran en la zona de desarrollo industrial de Hyondong.
					
					En algunas porciones del municipio de Hae-an de la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y de las comunas Mundong, Pudong y Jongsan del distrito Pukchong se crearan la zona de desarrollo industrial de Hungnam y la de desarrollo agricola de Pukchong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, respectivamente.
					
					Unas partes de la comuna Wolpho, el barrio Susong y la comuna Namsok del municipio de Songphyong de la ciudad de Chongjin, de la comuna Ryongjon del distrito Orang y de la cabecera distrital de Onsong, de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte se convertiran en la zona de desarrollo economico de Chongjin, la de desarrollo agricola de Orang y la de desarrollo turistico de la isla Onsong, de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, respectivamente.
					
					En algunas partes de la comuna Sinjang de la ciudad de Hyesan de la provincia de Ryanggang nacera la zona de desarrollo economico de Hyesan de la misma provincia.
					
					En algunos tramos de la comuna Ryongnam del municipio Waudo de la ciudad de Nampho se establecera la zona de elaboracion para la exportacion de Waudo de dicha ciudad.
					
					Las zonas de desarrollo economico de las citadas provincias estan bajo la soberania de la RPDC.

articles.title: Portavoz del CC de FGSC apoya lucha de habitantes surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz del CC de FGSC apoya lucha de habitantes surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Ahora en el Sur de Corea toma auge la lucha masiva de los obreros y otros sectores contra la represion fascista de la camarilla traidora a las fuerzas democraticas progresistas y contra sus maniobras para resucitar la dictadura de "Yusin" (renovacion).
					Las perplejas autoridades surcoreanas movilizaron a mas de diez mil policias para sofocar las manifestaciones pacificas con canones lanza-aguas y otros medios de represion, lo cual aumenta la rebeldia de los manifestantes.
					
					Al respecto, el vocero del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) publico una declaracion senalando que la protesta de la poblacion surcoreana deviene una explosion de la acumulada indignacion de los residuos de "Yusin" y el "poder" de Park Geun-hye que estan desesperados para reproducir en la tierra surcoreana la infame epoca de la dictadura de "Yusin" rechazando las elementales demandas democraticas.
					
					La nota continua:
					
					Si bien existieron en el Sur de Corea los regimenes represores, ninguno fue como el actual "poder" conservador que expone abiertamente su naturaleza fascista desde el principio de su mandato y busca la salida de su peor crisis de dominacion en la represion indiscriminada contra el movimiento obrero y las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas.
					
					En la actualidad, las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas persiguen obstinadamente sofocar la democracia y resucitar la dictadura de "Yusin" pese a la fuerte condena del interior y exterior del pais. Esto parte de su intencion de eliminar las semillas de progreso y democracia en el Sur de Corea, mantener el sistema de gobernacion de caracter antipopular, proyanqui y servil a grandes potencias y consolidar la base de prolongacion del poder conservador.
					
					Es una verguenza y desastre que se reprodujera en el Sur de Corea la dictadura de "Yusin", condenada duro por las masas populares hace varios decenios.
					
					La clase obrera del Norte de Corea apoyara activamente la justa lucha de los obreros y habitantes del Sur de Corea que se levantaron valientemente para construir una nueva sociedad democratizada y nueva vida verdadera.
